projects.name: Inflatables-Demo
projects.description: A multiplayer ragdoll physics game where characters made of inflatable materials pop each other's parts using needles. Built with custom assets and primitive shapes for optimized physics calculations.

projects.name: MimicFox
projects.description: Text-to-Speech extension for Firefox on Linux, enabling read aloud functionality using Mycroft's mimic

projects.name: SteamPortfolio
projects.description: Portfolio template designed to replicate the Steam profile interface

projects.name: Dark Scroll
projects.description: Firefox extension that implements a global dark scrollbar theme
